item.description:
A series of short animated films from Germany.  In German with English subtitles.  Free admission, with wine & cheese before the films.  Wine & cheese at 6PM, films at 7PM. 

Please keep your RSVP updated.  If you say that you're coming and later find out that you won't make it after all, please change your RSVP.  It's really helpful for me to know how many people are coming.

If you'd like me to send the information email to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my mobile phone number to anyone who replies before 4PM on Wednesday and says that they are coming. If you don't have a mobile phone, bring change. There is a pay phone in the basement of the Goethe-Institut.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Animated Films from Germany: He and She
